name: sauce-cypress-automation
description: Automação de testes E2E para o site Sauce Demo com Cypress.
author: Leonardo Gallardo

scripts.generate:report: npx marge cypress/reports/report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/html --reportTitle 'Relatório de Testes SauceDemo'
scripts.test:report: npm run test && npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:report
